As I stand before them, my eyes locked onto theirs, I can feel the weight of their desperation, their longing for answers in a chaotic world. And I am the one who provides them with the truth, the guidance they so desperately seek.

First and foremost, I establish myself as an authority figure, a prophet chosen by a higher power to reveal the secrets of the universe. My words are laced with conviction, my tone unwavering, as I speak of the impending apocalypse, the catastrophic events that will soon unfold. I draw upon ancient texts, twisted and interpreted to fit my narrative, and I present them as undeniable evidence of my prophetic abilities.

I create a sense of exclusivity, of being part of a select group, the chosen few who will be saved from the impending doom. My followers are the enlightened ones, the ones who have seen the truth, and I am their guide, their shepherd. I make them feel special, superior to those who do not share our vision, and this sense of superiority fosters a deep-seated loyalty, a willingness to follow me without question.

I am the guardian of their salvation, the one who holds the keys to their survival.
